lenders.occupational_info: I own and operate a fine art gallery and a beautiful Bed  and Breakfast located in a river valley in the gentle Green Mountains of Vermont. USA. I travel a lot, have spent time in most of the world and see myself as part of a "global family".  I have a specialty and deep regard for the creative ways in which all cultures express themselves.

lenders.loan_because: I believe the best way to help people in need, is to provide means which can enable them to help themselves. I believe this will leave them feeling proud of their own achievements, and give a strong feeling of self-worth and dignity.

lenders.loan_because: Happy to help!

lenders.name: Diane
lenders.loan_because: of my many blessings.

lenders.name: Gene

A long time ago someone helped me at a time when I really needed it and I did not forget.  Please remember and help others when you are able to.
lenders.occupational_info: I run a manufacturing company that makes wood swing sets for the backyards of families.

lenders.name: Bill
lenders.loan_because: it helps people build valuable stuff.
lenders.occupational_info: I design and build software.

lenders.name: Satyan
lenders.loan_because: I  believe in empowering the individual.

lenders.name: Lauren
lenders.loan_because: I know how hard it is to struggle with starting a business, and I want to help support other small business owners, especially entrepreneurs who are dealing with more difficult circumstances than I ever did.  I've been blessed in life and want to pay it forward.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the designer and producer of a line of handbags, totes and accessories called Lolafalk.

lenders.name: Claudia
lenders.loan_because: I loan for my nieces and nephews Lauren, Rachel, Evan, Ryan, to foster their appreciation for what they have and what they can give.

lenders.name: Ric Cuthbertson
lenders.loan_because:
I know first-hand what its like to seek financing for a new venture and have been very fortunate over the years in securing the funds needed to start businesses thanks to my good friends, family and successful and supportive business leaders in my community.

In my experience, financial institutions (The Banks) are horribly risk averse and do not, (by design) help those who don't already have the financial assets to support or create a new venture--they are designed to help those who, typically, already have the resources. Getting a business loan for a start up of any size in North America is a huge challenge and I can only imagine how tough it would be for an entrepreneur in a developing country, with little or no assets to speak of, to get a loan of any kind.  

I believe the microfinance loan concept combined with the power of the internet can truly transform lives--both that of the lender as well as the entrepreneur. I encourage everyone who has the financial means to consider making a microfinance loan either for themselves or as a gift to family and friends.

lenders.name: Alison
lenders.loan_because: I think Kiva is a powerful and sustainable way to help others make a better life for themselves. It's a very inspiring concept!

lenders.name: bendfence
lenders.loan_because: I'm cool

lenders.name: Archie & Kenny
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my small part to help people better themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: My agency provides housing and medical services to homeless people living with HIV/AIS

lenders.name: Katie
lenders.occupational_info: I help to publish a medical journal regarding diseases of the Ear, Nose, and Throat.

lenders.loan_because: god smiles at me when I help people in need

lenders.name: Sérgio
lenders.loan_because:
I can, I want, It makes me feel good,
I hope that the unecessary money, to me, will be usefull to lots of people who need it much more than me. It's unconceiveble that so many people live under the basic needs in a world with such abundance to the needs of all, living in happyness.
I hope our Creator joint us all in the feeling of fraternity and solidariety

lenders.occupational_info: I  help people after they have had an illness or injury. If they are too weak to get out of bed and walk, I help them exercise their muscles and how to walk again. They may need crutches or a cane. Or they may need to use a wheelchair.

lenders.loan_because: it teaches our four children about other cultures, other people, different economic situations.  We want to help people and believe the loans are a way to make others responsible for themselves.

lenders.loan_because: everybody deserves the opportunity to pursue their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide to businesses the technology and tools that help them realize their potential.

lenders.occupational_info: My work is to tell others about Jesus Christ.  He is the only one that can truly satisfy our needs.

lenders.name: Faye
lenders.loan_because: We are all responsible for each other.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: Everyone needs a loan at some point!

lenders.loan_because: Helping someone create their own income is priceless.
lenders.occupational_info: Student.

lenders.loan_because: family health indicies improve as poor women take charge of their financial destiny
lenders.occupational_info: Promote healthy habits

lenders.occupational_info: Iris is in the wine business and Brian finances apartment communities.

lenders.occupational_info: Lucky.

World peace depends on this.  Lending through Kiva is one more way to be a good example to my children (pictured.)
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a hospital where I care for sick and premature babies.

lenders.name: Genie
lenders.loan_because: This is such a worthwhile way of giving to people who are in need and trying to better the lives of their family. I try to select people from countries I have visited.

lenders.name: Robert
lenders.loan_because: We have a responsibility in caring for each other and fulfilling that responsibility is pure joy.

lenders.name: Carol
lenders.loan_because: Sharing is good.
lenders.occupational_info: I love to create things that make people smile.

lenders.name: Naomi
lenders.loan_because: It's a great way to make a difference in someone else's life.

lenders.name: Danielle Kristen Odom
lenders.occupation: Senior Lab Asst, Molecular Bio - Cancer Research
lenders.loan_because:
I believe that we are all global citizens of one planet and that we should treat others as we wish ourselves to be treated and that starts with two common, universal languages, Respect and Compassion.

Respect starts with the ethic of reciprocity, "the Golden Rule" or the basis of human rights. Compassion starts with a desire to relieve suffering of others.

This is why I loan. God bless.

As of Saturday August 22, 2009 I added an additional $50 to my lending credit in memory of my Granddad who passed away on this day. With my granddad as an inspiration, I hope to continue to spread the love, generosity, compassion and optimism that he willingly shared with everyone. May he rest in peace.

lenders.name: AshishB.
lenders.loan_because: this concept is fool proof,  honest and not really a "charity" cause....love the concept!!!

lenders.loan_because: God and people have been generous with me and I want to be generous with others.  I believe microloans are an effective way to encourage self-sufficiency and spread economic freedom.
lenders.occupational_info: I play piano for a church, accompany school choirs, teach piano lessons, direct a children's choir, perform concerts, write music, and record CDs.

lenders.name: amy and joe

lenders.occupational_info: High school teacher and nurse practitioner.

lenders.name: Ana
lenders.loan_because: To help people.

lenders.name: Celia
lenders.loan_because: ... I can. I have a lot to be grateful for, and I want to be part of good things in someone else's life too. As I see it, we're all part of each other in one world, and it's good to feel this solidarity.
lenders.occupational_info: My work is about listening respectfully to people who are troubled or lost in their lives and working with them to release their potential to be more than they are at present.

lenders.name: Kimberly
lenders.loan_because: I learned a long time ago that when you are in a position to help others, paying it forward is the right thing to do.  Positive intention brings about positive outcomes.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an educator.  I teach 7th and 8th grade reading and writing.  My job is to inspire my students  to want to  reach their full potential...to stretch beyond what they think they are capable of doing...even if it is hard.  This has been a hard year for me...diagnosed with breast cancer 10/10/07...but my students have seen that I'm a fighter even though it's hard at times...and I want them to know that my situation isn't nearly as rough as those who may walk a tougher road...struggling for the basic things that they, my students, often take for granted.

lenders.occupational_info: I design, build, and test spacecraft.  The most recent project I worked on, New Horizons, will reach the planet Pluto in eight years.

lenders.name: Leslee
lenders.loan_because: I feel grateful to be able to do so.

lenders.name: René
lenders.loan_because: Kiva provides a proven and effective channel through which development assistance funds can reach those truly in need.  Micro-credit works; a small loan can change someone's life.

lenders.name: Sean
lenders.loan_because: I'm blessed in so many ways, that I feel it's my obligation to provide as many opportunites as I can to others.

lenders.name: Todd

lenders.occupational_info: life is a quest.  A game for the strong.  Always worth living.  Over too soon.

lenders.name: Aaron
lenders.loan_because: the loan has been made in my name as an Christmas gift from my parents

lenders.name: Tiffany Rose Naputi
lenders.loan_because: my life has taken me from the sleepy southern village of Maloloj on isla Guahan in the Marianas Islands of Micronesia to the San Francisco Bay Area and I'd like to share my resources with my entrepreneurial brothers and sisters in the Pacific region.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as the director of finance and operations for a youth center that serves low-income lgbtq youth of color in the San Francisco Bay Area. I am also heavily involved in the Asian Pacific Islander progressive women's movement. I have  testified in the past to the U.N. on issues pertaining to Guam and will testify in Congress in 2008 on issues pertaining to the Commonwealth of the Northern Marianas Islands and other freely associated Pacific Island States.

I spend two days a week teaching college geography - including development.  I always use Kiva, All for Africa, and Heifer Project as examples of programs that work.

The rest of my work is related to animals - talking to them and helping them heal using Reiki, TTouch, and other complimentary therapies.

lenders.name: Denise

lenders.loan_because: I chose the group of Tanzanian woman with my children who are 9 & 11. We learned about the great things that Grameen bank & other microlenders have been doing and we wanted to get involved. The kids gave their own money.

lenders.occupational_info: I am blessed to be able to stay home and care for my children while my husband works.

lenders.name: Candy (Clara)

lenders.occupational_info:
I am retired now and a my husband and I have four grown sons and one grandson. He and I 
are both still interested in using some of our funds and time to help these striving people and their families.

lenders.name: Nancy
lenders.loan_because: It's a way for me to help the world be a better place. I can help people who want to help themselves! If I can help make someone's life better it's an amazing accomplishment! (and it's a way for me to remember that I have much more that some people, and that I should think twice before wanting to buy something I don't really need).
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a stay at home mom to a wonderful girl of 16 months.

lenders.name: Jeff
lenders.loan_because: I want everyone to have the same opportunity that I do.
lenders.occupational_info: I make software for computers and internet websites.

lenders.name: Samuel
lenders.loan_because: There Is Enough
lenders.occupational_info: X-Ray Technician

lenders.name: Betty Anne and Ron
lenders.loan_because: you just have to.

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: My son gave me a Kiva membership as a holiday gift. I love the idea that people around the world can help one another so easily and so directly.

lenders.name: Karen & Graeme
lenders.loan_because: We live in the lucky country of Australia and have travelled the world and seen others in need of help - even $25 can make a difference !
lenders.occupational_info: We both spent most of our employment working for a major airline and so we met people from many other countries and cultures.

lenders.name: Jenna and Todd
lenders.loan_because: It's a small thing we are able to do to impact someone's life, in a positive way. It's something we can do to contribute to the 'Global Village'.

lenders.loan_because: Mexican government helped my family when I was a kid

lenders.occupational_info: I work with investors to help them maximize their investment returns.

lenders.name: Michael Alexis

lenders.occupational_info: I study law.

lenders.name: Craig
lenders.loan_because: Loaning is an easy way to give back to a world that I believe I get so much from.
lenders.occupational_info: I fly around in a big airplane and serve Cokes to strangers.

lenders.name: Kalani
lenders.loan_because: I have lived in countries with people who struggle to take care of themselves and their families.  I can see what amazing things people can do when they get a small help.  I am glad to be a tiny part of that.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in a rural town by the ocean taking care of people with immediate emergency medical needs. I am married with five children, now all grown.

lenders.name: Steven
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dishwasher at Applebee's

lenders.name: Juan Jaramillo
lenders.loan_because: I have been privileged to have people that could help me when I needed and now I can do the same but with people all over the world.  I believe that small and personal efforts like the ones fomented by Kiva increase the economic well being of humanity and promote an international dialogue towards a better global village.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for an international health logistics project by providing capacity building to developing nations in the area of forecasting and supply planning.

lenders.name: Aimee Rae
lenders.loan_because: Every contribution helps when starting or growing a business. I also feel this model is a much more positive contribution to the global community. The large banking institutions do not bring the people and the money together like this service does.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage people and technology required to make web sites.

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel good to support others who are building their families future.
lenders.occupational_info: I make sure low income housing is decent and safe for habitation.

lenders.name: Brett
lenders.loan_because: i feel obligated to help those in need. I was blessed with many things that people around the world do not have.

lenders.name: marilyn
lenders.loan_because: I honor the life of Judge Solomon Casseb, Jr. in my 4 loans to men of Lebanon.  My other loan is to honor the loving spirit and nature of my beloved brother Michael in California.
lenders.occupational_info: Retired attorney

lenders.name: Terry
lenders.loan_because: People who work with integrity to make a better life for themselves end up creating a better world for all of us.
lenders.occupational_info: Women's Health Care Provider

lenders.name: Mathies
lenders.loan_because: I care, I can
lenders.occupational_info: Making people work better with the web.

lenders.name: $T3PH3N *864*
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I am thankful to have everything that I need & to help people that don't.

lenders.name: Alexandra
lenders.loan_because: Microfinance is highly effective in helping families to rise out of poverty. Women who borrow often are now able to get their children educated. In Bangladesh, the entire society is rising out of poverty, at least in part, due to the effectiveness of microfinance by the Grameen Bank. I want to be a part of changing the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm mostly retired, but I own an electrical contracting company with my husband (who is working all out). I'm also practicing an Energy Medicine called "BodyTalk." Another example of an Energy Medicine is acupuncture. Energy Medicines heal by unblocking the body's energies.

lenders.name: Umair Miraj
lenders.loan_because: I believe the people whom I loan the money, I see them on KIVA.org and I compare my life to them...such disparities urge me to help.

lenders.name: Carter
lenders.loan_because: It's great to help people!
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a student.

lenders.name: Devin
lenders.loan_because: Gratitude & stewardship for what I have been given.
lenders.occupational_info: I build wind turbines to generate electricity from the wind.

lenders.name: Elizabeth
lenders.loan_because: my children just gave me a wonderful Christmas present and I couldn't wait to share my blessings with others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a dental hygienist, teaching people how to stay healthy by taking care of their teeth.

lenders.name: Elena
lenders.loan_because: I believe people need tools, not handouts, to improve their lives and conserve their dignity.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach Spanish to native speakers of Spanish at the middle school level. We focus on literacy, cultural awareness, the arts and creativity. I also teach English to a broad spectrum of people when outside of the USA.

lenders.name: Christian and Gaviota
lenders.loan_because: We want to help those in need.

lenders.name: Janine
lenders.loan_because: It is terrific how you can help a small business out there with just the click of a button.

lenders.name: Tamara
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make a difference!

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: There's plenty of money for everyone in this world if we're all willing to share

lenders.name: Laura
lenders.loan_because: I'm thankful for what I have, and I respect hard work and the ability to make things happen for oneself.
lenders.occupational_info: My previous job was making sure computer programs work properly.  Currently I'm a student learning how to communicate ideas with pictures.

lenders.name: Ducklow Family
lenders.occupational_info: We are a family
